text: Horsfieldia punctatifolia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree that grows naturally in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore and Borneo. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia punctatifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
